name: Champion Chowdown
description:
You're just a small slime with big dreams.

You hope to become slime royalty, but what's a king without a kingdom? Luckily, you've found the perfect dungeon to rule over with a wobbly fist, but you've attracted the attention of every adventurer in the land!

You'll need to eat all the intruders in your new domain, but your tiny tummy can only hold mice at first. Eat them, grow, eat progressively tougher prey, and conquer!

You'll be a King Slime before you know it. It's time to chow down!

edit: fixed a bug where damage wasn't applied if you were at the tier of a new level
edit: fixed a bug where the game didn't end when you won
